books.title: The Midnight Library
books.author: Matt Haig
books.description: Between life and death there is a library, and within that library, the shelves go on forever. Every book provides a chance to try another life you could have lived.

books.title: Project Hail Mary
books.author: Andy Weir
books.description: A lone astronaut must save the earth from disaster in this incredible new science-based thriller from the #1 New York Times bestselling author of The Martian.

books.title: Klara and the Sun
books.author: Kazuo Ishiguro
books.description: From the bestselling author of Never Let Me Go and The Remains of the Day, a stunning new novel—his first since winning the Nobel Prize in Literature—about the mysteries of love and human connection.

books.title: The Code Breaker
books.author: Walter Isaacson
books.description: The bestselling author of Leonardo da Vinci and Steve Jobs returns with a gripping account of how Nobel Prize winner Jennifer Doudna and her colleagues launched a revolution that will allow us to cure diseases, fend off viruses, and have healthier babies.

books.title: The Four Winds
books.author: Kristin Hannah
books.description: From the number-one bestselling author of The Nightingale and The Great Alone comes a powerful American epic about love and heroism and hope, set during the Great Depression.

books.title: The Hill We Climb
books.author: Amanda Gorman
books.description: The Hill We Climb is an incredible poem that captures the moment and the movement of a nation.

books.title: The Anthropocene Reviewed
books.author: John Green
books.description: A deeply moving and mind-expanding collection of personal essays in the first ever work of non-fiction from #1 internationally bestselling author John Green.

books.title: The Last Thing He Told Me
books.author: Laura Dave
books.description: Before Owen Michaels disappears, he manages to smuggle a note to his beloved wife of one year: Protect her. Despite her confusion and fear, Hannah Hall knows exactly to whom the note refers—Owen's sixteen-year-old daughter, Bailey.

books.title: The Push
books.author: Ashley Audrain
books.description: A tense, page-turning psychological drama about the making and breaking of a family—and a woman whose experience of motherhood is nothing at all what she hoped for—and everything she feared.

books.title: The Sanatorium
books.author: Sarah Pearse
books.description: An imposing, isolated hotel, high up in the Swiss Alps, is the last place Elin Warner wants to be. But she's taken time off from her job as a detective, so when she receives an invitation out of the blue to celebrate her estranged brother's recent engagement, she has no choice but to accept.

books.title: The Invisible Life of Addie LaRue
books.author: V.E. Schwab
books.description: A Life No One Will Remember. A Story You Will Never Forget.

books.title: The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo
books.author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: Aging and reclusive Hollywood movie icon Evelyn Hugo is finally ready to tell the truth about her glamorous and scandalous life.

books.title: Atomic Habits
books.author: James Clear
books.description: No matter your goals, Atomic Habits offers a proven framework for improving every day.

books.title: The Thursday Murder Club
books.author: Richard Osman
books.description: Four septuagenarians meet weekly to discuss unsolved crimes and find themselves caught up in a real-life murder investigation.

books.title: The Vanishing Half
books.author: Brit Bennett
books.description: The Vignes twin sisters will always be identical. But after growing up together in a small, southern black community and running away at age sixteen, it's not just the shape of their daily lives that is different as adults.

books.title: The Guest List
books.author: Lucy Foley
books.description: A wedding celebration turns dark and deadly in this deliciously wicked and atmospheric thriller.

books.title: The House in the Cerulean Sea
books.author: TJ Klune
books.description: A magical island. A dangerous task. A burning secret.
